isLandingPage

@IPSJexlMethod(description="is this page referenced in the landing page slot",
               params=@IPSJexlParam(name="contentid",description="the content id of the current page"))
public boolean isLandingPage(String contentid)
                      throws Exception
Is this page referenced in the landing page slot. Will return true if the specified content id is referenced in a landing page slot. Note that this function is limited to PUBLIC navons. Navons in QuickEdit will not consider the relationships of the current revision, only the relationships of the last public revision.

Parameters:
contentid - the content id
Returns:
true if this page has a public navon parent in the landing page slot.
Throws:
Exception

isLandingPageInFolder

@IPSJexlMethod(description="is this page referenced in the landing page slot in the current folder",
               params={@IPSJexlParam(name="contentid",description="the content id of the current page"),@IPSJexlParam(name="folderid",description="the folder id of the current folder")})
public boolean isLandingPageInFolder(String contentid,
                                                                             String folderid)
                              throws Exception
Is this page referenced in the landing page slot in the current folder. Will return true if the specified content id is referenced in a landing page slot of the navon in the current folder

Parameters:
contentid - the content id.
folderid - the folder id
Returns:
true if this page is the landing page for the specified folder navon.
Throws:
Exception

hasOnlyPublicAncestors

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Does this item have any non-public ancestors",
               params={@IPSJexlParam(name="guid",description="the content item GUID"),@IPSJexlParam(name="slotName",description="slotName")})
public boolean hasOnlyPublicAncestors(com.percussion.utils.guid.IPSGuid guid,
                                                                              String slotName)
                               throws Exception
Checks if an item has any non-public ancestors. Convenience method for hasOnlyPublicAncestors(String, String, String)

Parameters:
guid - the current content item guid.
slotName - the slot name
Returns:
true if all ancestors in the slot are public.
Throws:
Exception

hasOnlyPublicAncestors

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Does this item have any non-public ancestors",
               params={@IPSJexlParam(name="contentId",description="content id for item"),@IPSJexlParam(name="slotName",description="slotName"),@IPSJexlParam(name="validFlags",description="validity flags considered public. Defaults to y,i")})
public boolean hasOnlyPublicAncestors(String contentId,
                                                                                           String slotName,
                                                                                           String validFlags)
                               throws Exception
Checks if an item has any non-public ancestors. The direct and indirect ancestors in the specified slot are scanned to make sure that they are in a workflow state consistent with the supplied validFlags.

Parameters:
contentId - the content id for the current item.
slotName - the slot name to scan
validFlags - the validity flags considered public as a comma separated list. Defaults to "y,i"
Returns:
true if all ancestors in the slot are public.
Throws:
Exception
See Also:
PSOParentFinder.hasOnlyPublicAncestors(String, String, List)

public List<String> getItemSlots(com.percussion.utils.guid.IPSGuid owner)
                          throws Exception

Exception
